The safe management of tailings storage facilities (TSFs) is essential to protect the environment and surrounding communities.
We are committed to implementing the Global Industry Standard on Tailings Management (GISTM) at all South32 operated TSFs.

The metrics we use to measure our performance are shown in the tables below.
Tailings waste generated and recycled / reused (kilotonnes)(1)

(1) To convert from kilotonnes to tonnes multiply by 1,000.
(2) In FY23, our calculation was revised to include tailings reused as well as tailings recycled. Numbers for prior financial years reflect tailings recycled only.
